item.title: Binding successful verification.
item.description: If you've made changes to your Notion database but find that the website content is still old, it indicates that the binding of the NotionPageID failed. Please recheck if the Vercel backend is configured with the correct ID and try redeploying.
item.content:encoded:
ğŸ˜€
If you have updated content in your Notion database but still see the old content on the website, it means the binding of the NotionPageID has failed. Please double-check the ID configuration in the Vercel dashboard and try redeploying.
Â

item.title: Example article
item.description: This is an example article summary. The content of the summary can be used for searching and previewing. The article list defaults to displaying summaries. If you want to directly display the content of the article in the list, you can configure it in blog.config.js.
item.content:encoded:
Basic paragraph

In the book there is a house of gold, in the book there is a beauty as fair as jade.
ğŸ’¡
The meaning of life is not to compete with others, but to enjoy the process of striving to achieve goals. The outcome is merely a commendation of one's own actions.

To the Guest of Honor

By Li Bai (Tang Dynasty) Reference [1]
Have you not seen the waters of the Yellow River flowing from the sky, rushing to the sea, never to return? Have you not seen the bright hall's mirror mourning the arrival of white hair, morning's black silk turning evening's snow? When life is at its peak, one must revel in joy, never let a golden goblet empty under the moon. By heaven's decree, my talents shall find use, even if a fortune is squandered, it shall return. Feasting on lamb and beef, let us rejoice, let us drink three hundred cups in a single sitting. Cen the Philosopher, Danqiu born, raise your cup and let us not stop. Let me sing a song for you, please lend me your ears. Treasures of jade and delicacies of the banquet may be precious, but I wish only to remain drunk and never awaken. Throughout history, the wise and virtuous have all been lonely, only the drinkers leave behind their names. In ancient times, King Chen feasted in the Hall of Peace, ten thousand cups of wine in boisterous revelry. Why should the host speak of modest sums? Go, fetch and pour, let's drink together. With five-flower horses and robes of a thousand gold, call the servants to bring forth fine wine, and together, let us dispel the sorrows of a thousand generations.
TANGLY's BLOG | è®°å½•æ€è€ƒã€åˆ†äº«æˆ‘çš„å­¦ä¹ ç¬”è®°

    11.Multi-level Directory

    Heading titles automatically converted into a table of contents in the blog.

    Subdirectory Level 1

    content 1

    Subdirectory Level 2

    content 2

    Subdirectory Level 3

    Subdirectory Level 3.1

    Different levels of headings represent different levels of directory.

    Subdirectory Level 3.2

    Higher-level directory nesting lower-level directories
    Â 

    Multi-level Lists

    • Inevitability of Things
    1. Things change according to certain laws, and there is also an inevitable nature to them. This nature is called inevitability.
      1. The inevitability of things is the nature of the things themselves (our opposition to fatalism lies in the fact that it believes everything is controlled by the gods, rather than opposing the fact that there are inevitable qualities in the development of things).
        1. Third-level list
        2. Third-level list
      2. It is determined by the development of the thing itself and the surrounding conditions.
        1. Third-level list
          1. Third-level list

    The system supports six comment plugins: Waline, Giscus, Valine, GitTalk, Utterance, Cusdis, and Twikoo. You can enable them simultaneously and switch between them by clicking on the tabs in the comment section.

item.title: Introduction
item.description: <- Click the title OPEN button for instructions; please check if your NOTION_PAGE_ID is configured successfully, otherwise it will display my default database content.
item.content:encoded:
How to Write Articles Using Notion

Please visit the tutorial for assistance.
å¦‚ä½•åœ¨Notionä¸­å¼€å§‹å†™ä½œ | NotionNextæ–‡æ¡£
è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç”±NotionNextç”Ÿæˆçš„ç«™ç‚¹
https://docs.tangly1024.com/article/start-to-write
Notionå¿«æ·é”® | NotionNextæ–‡æ¡£
Notionæœ‰å¾ˆå¤šä½¿ç”¨çš„å¿«æ·é”®ï¼Œçœ‹å®Œè¿™ç¯‡æ–‡ç« ï¼Œè®©ä½ çš„æ•ˆç‡åŠ å€
https://docs.tangly1024.com/article/notion-short-key

Template Usage Instructions

The NotionNext project must be linked to a Notion database in order to be used. Please visit the tutorial for assistance.
Verceläº‘éƒ¨ç½² | NotionNextæ–‡æ¡£
Vercelæ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾å›½å¤–çš„Serverlessæ‰˜ç®¡å¹³å°ï¼Œå¯¹ä¸ªäººç”¨æˆ·ä½¿ç”¨å‡ ä¹å…è´¹ï¼Œè€Œä¸”æ–¹ä¾¿å¿«æ·ï¼Œç”¨Vercelæ‰˜ç®¡ä½ çš„Notionç«™ç‚¹ï¼Œæ— éœ€å†æ“å¿ƒæœåŠ¡å™¨çš„ç»´æŠ¤ä¸èµ„è´¹é—®é¢˜ã€‚
https://docs.tangly1024.com/article/vercel-deploy-notion-next#3df829414795492bb41ec351eb6da84e
Â 

Explanation of Notion Template Fields

In the Notion database, each entry will have the following properties: ğŸ¤”
Attributes
Required
Description
Remark
title
Yes
Article Title
ã…¤
status
Yes
Publication Status
Will only be displayed when the status is Published
type
Yes
Page Type (Post / Page)
Pages won't appear in the blog post list.
summary
Optional
Content Summary
Used for search and brief display, will be shown in the article list
date
Optional
å‘å¸ƒæ—¥æœŸ
Prior to version V3.3.9, this field was required.
category
Optional
Article Category
Customizable
tags
Optional
Article Tags
Multiple tags allowed, but it's recommended not to have too many.
slug
Optional
Article Short Path
Unique for each article, please do not repeat.
icon
Optional
Menu Bar Icon (Only valid for Page/Menu type)
You can refer to: Icon Library
password
Optional
Article Password
Password required for access."
Each column in the database serves a different purpose;
type: Indicates the type of data, which can be notice (å…¬å‘Š), post (æ–‡ç« ), page (å•é¡µ), menu (èœå•), submenu (å­èœå•), among others.
slug: Depending on the data type, it serves different functions: in menus, it indicates the page to which it links; in articles, it represents the access address of the article within the blog. For instance, if the data is a page with the slug "test", it can be accessed via https://domain/test; whereas if it's a post with the slug "example", it can be accessed via https://domain/article/example, and it will also appear in your homepage list.
